Subaru 0-60 times

It feels like you love hitting the gas pedal to the very bottom and put some interest in Subaru vehicles. Curious to know what Subaru model has the best 0-60 times? For your convenience our team has collected the acceleration data in one place so that you could check out accurate stats on Subaru 0-60 times across models and years.

Browse through the variety of Subaru models to discover the brand’s vehicles with the best as well as the poorest 0-60 mph performance. You might also want to trace how 0-60 times of a specific Subaru model changed across years or compare between different models of the Subaru family.

Why is that so important? It is as simple as that. Although official Subaru 0-60 times are almost impossible to reach in real world conditions, at least, it is a great indicator of engine’s power. For only 1% of people are interested in this information, you may rightfully be proud of yourself!

The fastest Subaru cars

Subaru WRX STI 0-60 4.6 - 4.8 sec 1/4 mile 13.2 @ 106 - 13.4 @ 102 mph
Subaru WRX 0-60 5.2 - 5.3 sec 1/4 mile 13.7 @ 100 - 13.9 @ 99 mph
Subaru Impreza WRX STi 0-60 5.4 - 5.7 sec 1/4 mile 13.8 @ 99 - 13.9 @ 97 mph
Subaru Impreza WRX 0-60 5.6 - 5.9 sec 1/4 mile 13.9 @ 99 - 14.4 @ 97 mph
Subaru Legacy 0-60 5.6 - 9.2 sec 1/4 mile 14.4 @ 94 - 17 @ 80 mph
Subaru Impreza 0-60 5.7 - 9.8 sec 1/4 mile 14.3 @ 98 - 17.5 @ 78 mph
Subaru Outback 0-60 5.8 - 9.6 sec 1/4 mile 14.6 @ 95 - 17.4 @ 78 mph
Subaru Forester 0-60 6.3 - 8.8 sec 1/4 mile 14.9 @ 97 - 17.2 @ 79 mph
Subaru BRZ 0-60 6.4 sec 1/4 mile 14.9 @ 96 - 15.3 @ 91 mph
Subaru Tribeca 0-60 6.6 - 6.7 sec 1/4 mile 15.1 @ 86 - 15.2 @ 85 mph
Subaru Baja 0-60 6.7 - 9.8 sec 1/4 mile 15.3 @ 88 - 17.1 @ 81 mph
Subaru B9 Tribeca 0-60 7 - 7.1 sec 1/4 mile 15.3 @ 84 - 15.4 @ 84 mph
Subaru Impreza Outback Sport 0-60 7.2 - 8.8 sec 1/4 mile 15.6 @ 86 - 16.4 @ 82 mph
Subaru XV Crosstrek 0-60 9.2 - 10.7 sec 1/4 mile 17.1 @ 80 - 18 @ 77 mph
Subaru Crosstrek 0-60 10 sec 1/4 mile 17.5 @ 79 mph
Subaru Crosstrek Hybrid 0-60 10.1 sec 1/4 mile 17.7 @ 81 mph
Subaru XV Crosstrek Hybrid 0-60 10.7 sec 1/4 mile 18.1 @ 79 mph
